original_title: Bakeer Markar commemoration speeches on SLBC today
original_body_lines: Commemorative speeches on Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation will be aired on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of former Speaker Late Deshamanya M.A. Bakeer Markar which falls on 12 May 2023.

MP Kavinda Jayawardena will speak on Sinhala Swadeshiya Service (91.7/91.9 FM) at 12 p.m. while Attorney at Law Lihini Fernando will speak on the English Service (97.4/97.6 FM) at 2:30 p.m. MP Shanakyan Rasamanickam MP will speak on the Tamil Service (102.1 FM/91.9 FM) at 7:30 p.m. while Zam Zam Foundation CEO Mohamed Hisham will speak on the Muslim Service (102.1/102.3 FM) at 8:05 p.m.
